| Property        | Attribute        | Description | Type                                               | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `arrowPosition` | `arrow-position` |             | `"end" \| "middle" \| "start"`                     | `'middle'`  |
| `arrowSide`     | `arrow-side`     |             | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "none" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'none'`    |
| `bgColor`       | `bg-color`       |             | `"neutral" \| "primary"`                           | `'neutral'` |
